definition: to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
to guard/to defend/to keep watch/to abide by the law/to observe (rules or ritual)/nearby/adjoining

sentences.english: The subject of any other monograph must comply throughout its period of use.
sentences.chinese: 任何另外的專論的內容必須遵守其使用週期。

sentences.english: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
sentences.chinese: 都恆心遵守使徒的教訓，彼此交接，擘餅，祈禱。

sentences.english: Please obey the rules, NOT to crowd or play around when you are touring.
sentences.chinese: 參觀遊覽時，請遵守秩序，不要擁擠打鬧。

sentences.english: The activities of Regional Alliances will conform to the Rules for Regional Alliances of ICOM National Committees.
sentences.chinese: 地區聯盟旳活動應遵守自身旳程序規則。

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格遵守法律法規，食品安全從產品設計抓起。

sentences.english: Abides by the Sofitel Employee Handbook.
sentences.chinese: 遵守索菲特酒店員工守則。

sentences.english: He is a club member in good standing.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個遵守會章的俱樂部會員。

sentences.english: Capable of strictly abiding by the stipulations on the printing of invoices and the production and management of special products for anti-fake invoices.
sentences.chinese: 能嚴格遵守發票印製和發票防僞專用品生產管理規定。

sentences.english: Eating caveman style is about PRINCIPLES.
sentences.chinese: 穴居人的飲食習慣就是遵守原則。

sentences.english: Section 3. Cardholders are required to comply with this Code of Practice.
sentences.chinese: 第三條持卡人須遵守本守則。

sentences.english: There is even a big fine if one disobeys the laws.
sentences.chinese: 要能有愉快的車程，遵守安全法規是很重要的。

sentences.english: This bloke was breaking the unwritten rules for men.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙打破了男人們應該遵守的不成文規則。

sentences.english: Each extension point is unique and defines a contract to be adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 每個擴展點都是惟一的並且定義需要遵守的契約。

sentences.english: So the citizen has the obligation to obey such good law.
sentences.chinese: 對於這樣的良法，公民就有遵守的義務。

sentences.english: Aigner herself claims to do as much as she can to follow these guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 艾格納聲稱自己會盡可能遵守這些準則。

sentences.english: We agree to abide by the condition printed on the back of this form.
sentences.chinese: 我們同意遵守印於本表背面的規則。

definition: to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
